name: Dogs, Rabbits, Aliens
description:
This game was designed for 2 players. I didn't have time to implement an AI of any kind, so grab a buddy to play!

This game is mobile friendly!

Rules: Object:

Get one of your pieces to the other side!

Details:

Each piece can move one space in any direction. When an enemy piece is in range, you can choose to attack that enemy piece.

Attacking:

Each different type of piece (Dog, Rabbit, Alien or Spaceship) has two specialty moves, and a dodge. When a player attacks, both players choose a move (It is highly reccomended that players look away when other players are choosing their move. This gives the game a "rock, paper, scissors" style strategy). Specialty moves will interact, giving one of three outcomes:

A full win: The loser's piece is removed, and the winner's piece advances.

A half win: The loser's piece is removed, but the winner's piece remains still.

A draw: Neither piece is removed, or moved.

If one player dodges, the other will advance.
